title: FreePBX紧急披露CVSS10分零日漏洞，可致远程代码执行
title_translated: FreePBX has urgently disclosed a CVSS 10.0 zero-day vulnerability that can lead to remote code execution.
summary: A critical vulnerability in Sangoma FreePBX allows unauthenticated attackers to bypass login protections, manipulate databases, and achieve remote code execution. Active exploitation has been observed since August 21, 2025, affecting FreePBX 16 and 17 systems exposed to the public internet.

title: VMware Photon OS: CVE-2024-52006
summary: A vulnerability in Git affects credential helpers that misinterpret Carriage Return characters, leading to incomplete protections against previous CVEs. Users are strongly advised to upgrade to the latest versions to mitigate this critical risk.

title: IBM发布紧急补丁修复Jazz Team Server高危漏洞（CVE-2025-36157）
title_translated: IBM has released an emergency patch to fix a critical vulnerability (CVE-2025-36157) in Jazz Team Server.
summary: IBM's Jazz Team Server has a critical vulnerability that allows unauthorized remote attackers to update server configuration files, potentially leading to unauthorized operations and denial of service. This affects multiple products within the IBM Engineering Lifecycle Management suite.
affected_products: IBM Engineering Lifecycle Management – Jazz Foundation

title: CVE-2025-9288安全警报：热门JS库曝关键漏洞 全球网络安全受严重威胁
title_translated: CVE-2025-9288 Security Alert: Critical vulnerability in popular JS library poses a serious threat to global cybersecurity.
summary: The sha.js encryption library has a critical vulnerability due to missing input type checks, allowing attackers to exploit hash state rollbacks and convert tagged hashes to untagged hashes. This flaw can lead to significant data integrity issues and potential exploitation through crafted malicious inputs.

title: CISA紧急警报：苹果iOS/iPadOS/macOS零日漏洞遭主动利用 数百万设备面临威胁
title_translated: CISA emergency alert: Apple iOS/iPadOS/macOS zero-day vulnerability actively exploited, posing a threat to millions of devices.
summary: A critical zero-day vulnerability in Apple's Image I/O framework allows for code execution through malicious images, affecting iOS, iPadOS, and macOS systems. Attackers can exploit this buffer overflow flaw to execute arbitrary code, leading to potential system crashes or privilege escalation. Immediate action is required to install security updates.

title: CVE-2025-55746漏洞预警：Directus高危漏洞曝出 未授权文件上传可致服务器沦陷
title_translated: CVE-2025-55746 Vulnerability Alert: High-risk vulnerability in Directus exposed, unauthorized file upload could lead to server compromise.
summary: The Directus project has disclosed a critical vulnerability that allows unauthenticated attackers to upload or modify files on affected servers due to a flaw in the file handling route. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to bypass security mechanisms and upload malicious files, posing a significant risk to earlier versions of the software.
